document_data.caption: ''Shindia Darkeyes (third from left) with other members of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]]''
document_data.name: Shindia Darkeyes
document_data.mainbody:
'''Shindia Darkeyes''' was a female [[half-drow]] in the service of the [[Xanathar Thieves' Guild]].

In truth, she was the favorite servant of the original [[Xanathar (original)|Xanathar]] and when [[Xanathar|the Eye]] killed and impersonated the Xanathar she agreed to join the reformed organization, but in secret she plotted to destroy the Eye, with help from the [[mind flayer]]s of [[Ch'Chitl]]. Unknown to her, the Eye knew all about her plots.
document_data.Personality: She ran the blackmail, extortion, and information-gathering operations of the guild.
